mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EDUCATIONINFO ( EDU_ID ,EDU_NAME ,EDU_INST ,EDU_START_DT ,EDU_END_DT ,EDU_TIME ,EDU_CONTENT ,EMAIL ,RESUME_ID ) VALUES ( 'EDU' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') || '-' || LPAD(EDUCATIONINFO_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,#{email} ,#{resumeId} )
